name: Grilled Chicken with Herbs
author: Robyn Webb
summary: Boneless chicken breasts marinated in herbs, garlic, oil and vinegar and broiled or grilled to perfection. This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks, articles and recipes by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association. Preparation time: 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped Italian flat leaf parsley
1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts
directions: In a blender combine the parsley, rosemary, thyme, sage, garlic, oil, vinegar and salt and pepper to taste
Place chicken in a nonporous glass dish or bowl and pour blended marinade over the chicken
Cover dish and refrigerate to marinate for at least 2 hours or up to 48 hours
Preheat grill to medium high heat OR set oven to broil
Remove chicken from dish (disposing of leftover marinade) and grill or broil for about 6 to 7 minutes per side, or until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside
